sentences.sentence: I want to see an endocrinologist.
The reproductive endocrinologist or embryologist will discuss this with the patient prior to the transfer.
sentences.translation: 移植前生殖内分泌学家或胚胎学家会和患者讨论这个问题。

sentences.sentence: A couple of years ago he broke his foot and found out that his bones were thin and weak. He saw an endocrinologist, who was treating him for that problem.
sentences.translation: 几年前摔到脚后他才发现骨头细小脆弱，针对这个问题，去看了内分泌专家。
